description: Dashboard visualizing ContainerLogV2 records collected by Azure Monitor

options.content:
## Kubernetes Logs Metadata 

Kubernetes Logs Metadata encompasses essential information such as Pod labels, Pod Annotations, Image, ImageHash, ImageRepo, and PodUID. This metadata plays a crucial role in enabling rich context for log records, allowing seamless correlation with Kubernetes resources.

The dashboard presented here visualizes ContainerLogV2 data alongside Kubernetes Metadata. 

For further details and step by step onboarding guide, please refer to the documentation here:
[Kubernetes Logs Metadata Documentation](https://aka.ms/KubernetesMetadataAndLogsFilteringDocumentation).

links.title: Critical Explore
Error Explore
Warning Explore
Debug Explore
Info Explore
Trace Explore
Unknown Explore
Log Records Explore

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by LogLevel

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), LogLevel
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

links.title: Log Volumn Explore

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend DataVolume = _BilledSize
| summarize TotalDataVolume = round(sum(DataVolume), 4)

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend DataVolumeMB = _BilledSize
| summarize TotalDataVolumeMB = round(sum(DataVolumeMB), 4) by Computer
| order by TotalDataVolumeMB desc

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend DataVolumeMB = _BilledSize
| summarize TotalDataVolumeMB = round(sum(DataVolumeMB), 4) by PodName
| order by TotalDataVolumeMB desc

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend DataVolumeMB = _BilledSize
| summarize TotalDataVolumeMB = round(sum(DataVolumeMB), 4) by ContainerName
| order by TotalDataVolumeMB desc

links.title: Log Rate Explore

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize CountPerMinute = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| summarize AverageLogRatePerMinute = avg(CountPerMinute)

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), PodName
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

links.title: Log Record Explore

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize TotalCount = count()

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize LogCount = count() by Computer

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize LogCount = count() by PodName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize LogCount = count() by ContainerName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| extend NamespaceInput = "$Namespace"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| project TimeGenerated, LogMessage, LogLevel, PodName, KubernetesMetadata, Computer, ContainerName, ContainerId
| take 100

panels.title: Last 100 Log Records - Click any row to access full list

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
| where id =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| extend props = parse_json(properties)
| extend lawResourceId = tostring(props.addonProfiles.omsAgent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID)
| extend LAWS = iff(isnotempty(lawResourceId), lawResourceId, tostring(props.addonProfiles.omsagent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID))
| project LAWS

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| extend PodNamespace = "$Namespace"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| where isnotempty(LabelName)
| distinct LabelName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where  PodNamespace == "$Namespace"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| where LabelName in ($LabelKey)
| extend LabelValue = tostring(LabelsJson[LabelName])
| where isnotempty(LabelValue)
| distinct LabelValue

title: Azure Monitor / Container Insights / ContainerLogV2
